description: Swap operations observability: quote performance, provider behavior, errors, and outcomes

panels.description: Quote requests per second across all providers and coin pairs
panels.title: Total Quote Rate

targets.expr: (sum(rate(swap_quote_requests_total{provider=~"$provider", quote_type=~"$quote_type", source_coin=~"$source_coin", dest_coin=~"$dest_coin", status="error"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)) / clamp_min(sum(rate(swap_quote_requests_total{provider=~"$provider", quote_type=~"$quote_type", source_coin=~"$source_coin", dest_coin=~"$dest_coin"}[$__rate_interval])), 1)

panels.description: Percentage of quote requests returning errors. Green < 5%, yellow 5-10%, red > 10%
panels.title: Quote Error Rate %

panels.description: Half of all quotes respond faster than this
panels.title: Median Latency (P50)

panels.description: 99th percentile: worst-case latency excluding extreme outliers
panels.title: P99 Latency
Top Token Pairs by Provider Wins

panels.description: Percentage of completed swaps that succeeded. Green above 95% threshold line
panels.title: Success Rate Over Time

title: Swaps
